publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2321# Mr Jamie Stone: Winter Roads Maintenance Programme in the Highlandsâ€”That the Parliament notes with concern the continuing reduction in the winter roads maintenance programme in remote parts of the Highlands and asks the Scottish Executive to look into this issue as a matter of urgency before the onset of winter.
